title: Create, read, update and delete records
text: mobile app typically need: * single record: perPage = 1. * latest temporal entry (descending sort FLIGHT_DATE, sort = "-FLIGHT_DATE" ). also make sure ask totals improves performance/speed server side,.e. set skipTotal value. (paged) records (two per page, just example) totals.
code: # only last temporal entry, no totals ph_list_records(     app = app,     api = "/api/collections/",     collection = collection,     perPage = 1,     sort = "-FLIGHT_DATE",     skipTotal = 1) # only one entry, w/ totals ph_list_records(   app = app,   api = "/api/collections/",   collection = collection,   perPage = 2,   sort = "-FLIGHT_DATE")

title: create record — ph_create_record
code: if (FALSE) { adm <- ph_authenticate_admin_username_password(   "eurocontrol-data",   "/api/admins/auth-with-password",   username,   password)   bd <- list(     AVG_ROLLING_WEEK= 22065.4285714286,     DAY_DIFF_PREV_YEAR_PERC= 0.035235526043,     DAY_TFC= 24944,     DAY_TFC_DIFF_2019_PERC= -0.11967531322,     DIFF_ROLLING_WEEK_2019_PERC= -0.13323232323,     DIFF_WEEK_PREV_YEAR_PERC= 0.027945081493,     FLIGHT_DATE= "2024-01-01 00:00:00.000Z",     Y2D_AVG_TFC_YEAR= 23172.4210526316,     Y2D_DIFF_2019_PERC= -0.087499533673,     Y2D_DIFF_PREV_YEAR_PERC= 0.051857514872,     Y2D_TFC_YEAR= 440276     )  ph_create_record(   app = "eurocontrol-data",   api = "/api/collections",   collection = "nw_traffic",   token = adm$token,   body = bd) }
